summary: When a spaceship lands on the moon, it is hailed as a new accomplishment, before it becomes clear that a Victorian party completed the journey in 1899, leading investigators to that mission's last survivor.
cast: Edward Judd|Martha Hyer|Lionel Jeffries|Miles Malleson|Norman Bird|Gladys Henson|Hugh McDermott|Betty McDowall|Paul Carpenter|Erik Chitty|Valentine Dyall|Peter Finch|John Forbes-Robertson|Patrick Halpin|Laurence Herder|George Hilsdon|Douglas Ives|Sean Kelly|Marne Maitland|Terry Marison|Mary Maxfield|Gordon Robinson|John Murray Scott|Huw Thomas|Tim Turner|Kenneth Watson
keywords: giant insect|psychotronic film|low budget sci fi movie|astronomical object in title|man on moon
title: La gran sorpresa
